plot outline: Anbu, a dubbing artiste, falls in love with his sister's friend Jyothi, who is in love with Gautham. Just when they are about to get married, an accident changes the course of their lives forever.
title: Ullam Kollai Poguthae
plot: Anbu, a dubbing artiste, falls in love with his sister's friend Jyothi, who is in love with Gautham. Just when they are about to get married, an accident changes the course of their lives forever.
